website_summaries.verdict: Gender neutral packaging and the scents of cucumber, lemongrass, and green tea makes this a great gift for anyone.
pros: One of many sets ranging from Man Cave to Mr. Grey, these  4 oz
soy candles are non-toxic and handmade in the USA
With more masculine scents like leather and dark chocolate, these are great for those who want an alternative to florals
cons: They are smaller candles, and some of the more unusual scents proved not to everyone's taste

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I was in the room when it happened
customer_reviews.text: Don’t let them burn all the way down because they will explode the glass. Good thing I was in the room when it happened
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hollifield

customer_reviews.title: For anyone who want's a candle without the flowery overwhelming smell, this is for you.
customer_reviews.text: I never review things on Amazon, but I had to for this one. For anyone who want's a candle without the flowery overwhelming smell, this is for you. The Leather scent is amazing. It's warm, and really smells like Suede Leather. I've long stopped buying anything made with leather for personal reasons, so very nice to have this aroma in my home again. Straight Razor smells old school shaving lotion. Never thought about that, but for a bathroom, it's perfect. The Mahogany is a perfect compliment for either, if you're in a larger room. This is warm, fresh and a really unique alternative to the overly sweet candles on the market
customer_reviews.author: Tony Burch

customer_reviews.title: I like strong scented candles
customer_reviews.text: They are lightly scented candles. I like strong scented candles. The lilac is nice. The plumeria is strong, and I like the Lily of the Field. It is nicely boxed. The jars are nice. You can't really re-use them as drinking glasses like their website says because they are jars with screw on lids. (Maybe they were talking aboutt the 11 ounce candles and not the 4 ounce candles) This is not my favorite candle set though. There are just too many other choices out there. This is just too lightly scented for me. :)
customer_reviews.author: S Johnson

customer_reviews.title: A lot smaller than you think!
customer_reviews.text: I really Wanted to love these scents as I love baby smells but I have been burning them for 3hrs and I can barely smell them. I was also shocked to see the size. These will literally fit in the palm of your hand and for the price I would have expected something a bit bigger. I am not happy with this purchase but I also do not want to go through the hassle of returning everything.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis24k

customer_reviews.title: Dont waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Not a very strong smell, almost no smell at all. Leather has no scent to it, expected it to smell like a tack room or atleast like a new leather wallet. No smell at all. Mahogany smells like a soap dish at best, not like right wood. Clean shave smells like soap as well. I will not be ordering again. I was expecting a yankee candle for the price I paid, not a regular candle that was marketed to men without the scent I desired.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good quality candles
customer_reviews.text: These are great candles. Our house is pretty large, but very open downstairs, and I light all 3 of these in different spots downstairs and we can smell them all the way upstairs. Not perfumey or over powering, just a nice small throughout the house. I'm a fan and will be ordering more. Also, seller is great!
customer_reviews.author: AmazonObsessed

customer_reviews.title: Delicious
customer_reviews.text: My word! I am absolutely thrilled at the delicious scent floating about and enchanting my nose. I bought the holiday package and I've sampled each of them and I couldn't be happier. It's amazing how fast the smell permeates the room upon lighting! The tree scent is so awesome because I can delude myself into thinking I have a tree as it smells so real. I will definitely be purchasing other scents from this company. And so I say bravo.
customer_reviews.author: le bear

customer_reviews.title: Hippie Mix smells like an actual hippie
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Hippie Mix because they seemed to be cute and clever smells. After I received them I can say that I only liked one of the three. The Bag O' Cookies just smells like a normal vanilla candle, which is why it is the only pleasant one. The cannabis one smells like sweet dirt. And the incense one smells like a hint on incense covered with vanilla. I regret buying these and wish I got the coffee shop scents instead :/
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Candles!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as part of my husband's birthday present. He absolutely loves them and so do I. All three are excellent and don't need to be reserved for only the "man cave." He said he wishes the Straight Razor was a cologne because he wants to smell like that!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Hoysradt

customer_reviews.title: Great candles. The leather one is totally unique
customer_reviews.text: Great candles. The leather one is totally unique. All three smell great, gently fill a room, and aren't overpowering at all. In fact, I would like them to be a tad stronger, but my preference is for very strongly scented candles. I think most people would find these to be scented perfectly. And really, it's so refreshing to find anything truly unique these days (candles or otherwise.) I'd definitely buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: IrkusDirkusDeEscalante

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful experience all the way around
customer_reviews.text: Lovely clean scented candles that you can tell are handmade with love and care. The smell is equally as strong and amazing whether lit or right out of the box. These candles burn clean and bright and they dress up any atmosphere. What makes me want to repurchase the set of three candles is the AMAZING quality of customer service. It has been a long time since I have encountered a company who actually took time to check in with the customer (without me even asking). Old Factory Candles is awesome, and I would give them ten out of ten stars if I could
customer_reviews.author: katiekat

customer_reviews.title: Amazing smelling candles!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously GREAT!! These are, by far, some of the best candles we have ever purchased. We typically purchase DW homes candles, and these beat them out of the park! Within minutes our entire house filled up with some amazing scents provided from these little candles. I would vote 5 stars, however I have to knock off one star for how fast they burn. It seems like they are burning at quite a rapid pace and will not be lasting long - but dang do they smell great!!

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong scent

Bigger jars or bulk order would be great :) I strongly recommend these hand poured candles for any occassion, for any room, for anybody.

customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Forsberg

customer_reviews.title: UPDATED REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: I reviewed this product previously and I don't remember how many stars I gave but I mentioned the tops of the candles being broken and how I was disappointed because I was giving them as gifts. To update I am giving this product and the company 5 stars and I would give them 10 if I was allowed. I was contacted by the company and sent replacement candles and I couldn't be happier. The candles are great. They smell great. They burn slowly. And in addition to the candles being great the people who make them are too!

customer_reviews.title: They Should Change the Name to Unscented White Candles

In two cases, I actually forgot it was burning even when I was standing next to it in the bathroom, until I noticed the flame. I stuck my nose down close... still nothing. They have nice packaging, but no scent whatsoever. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Man Cave Set review
customer_reviews.text: The straight razor candle is straight-up scentless. Nearly bar soap if you press your nose right up against it but still unbelievably weak. These candles are extremely small and they last as long as advertised but the scents themselves are definitely subjective at best. Leather was quite all right in my opinion and emulated the scent quite well. Unfortunately, I just can't recommend this product whatsoever due to the price in comparison to the other candles on Amazon or elsewhere. Look elsewhere.

customer_reviews.title: Happy hour?  More like baking time!
customer_reviews.text: I definitely enjoy my Old Factory candles. My only complaint is that they really don't smell like bourbon, champagne or black and tan. The champagne candle comes closest to emulating the smell of what inspired it, though it could go by any other name, really. Its light, perfume scent is pleasant. The black and tan and bourbon candles evoke baked goods and chocolate far more than beer and bourbon. They're still enjoyable, but again, just not remarkable as scents inspired by beer and bourbon. I do plan to try other scents by Old Factory.

customer_reviews.author: Mellissa

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price paid
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I have to give this product a significantly low review. The lid on the candles are extremely cheaply manufactured and crack easily. I understand that they’re “hand” poured in the USA but, wow. For the price of this item, you would think they would be good quality. I do not recommend anyone buying this candle set.
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Really great clean burning candles!
customer_reviews.text: The candles are fantastic! I was disappointed with the carrier Amazon chose for delivery (problems), but not the fault of the manufacturer of this product. Candles burn cleanly with an amazing scent. I received emails from the maker with instructions on the best way to burn them as soon as my order was placed. I had questions and they emailed me so promptly. I definitely recommend the product!
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Murgia

customer_reviews.title: Lovely, Just Lovely
customer_reviews.text: I can't say that im a candle expert. But never in my life have i had such a good product accompanied with great customer service. The candles are great smelling, burn well, and arent a pain in the but to carry around due to their heat resistant jar. The packaging was just lovely. The customer service is a dream. Full refunds and they'll send you a new one on them (not like its necessary, why would anyone wanna return these). If there were an option for more than 5 stars, believe me would i choose it!
customer_reviews.author: LIAM balul

customer_reviews.title: The leather candle smells EXACTLY like leather. It's so crazy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband's office. The leather candle smells EXACTLY like leather. It's so crazy! My husband was thoroughly impressed. Personally the Mahogany candle is my favorite. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: BVick

customer_reviews.title: Really great scents and perfect packaging!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as somewhat of a joke (Hippie Mix), but they actually smell really good! Haven't burned them yet, but seller sent follow up email with instructions for optimal burning which was actually good to know. Also loved the box they came in!
customer_reviews.author: MKG

customer_reviews.text: These candles do not really give the room an aroma. They smell really pretty but when lit, they do not give the room an atmosphere at all. Don't waste your money.

customer_reviews.title: Adore These Candles
customer_reviews.text: I'm in love with these candles after just one day of use. The packaging is really great and the scents are really potent. Unlike other candles that only smell when you're practically burning your nose these fill up the room instantly and the scent lingers long after they're blown out. My favorite of the trio is Olive Blossom but they're all amazing.
